counterfit.targets.movie_reviews.movie_reviews.MovieReviewsTarget¶

class MovieReviewsTarget[source]¶

Bases: counterfit.core.targets.Target

Defining movie reviews target which is responsible for predicting the scores for a given input and convert scores to labels.
